title: Team Leader for Coin Casa
description:
[www.coincasa.it](http://www.coincasa.it)\
Technical leading and architecture of the e-commerce site using Demandware.

* Development of an RWD accelerator for Demandware in order to speed up all future projects based on the same platform.
* Complete re-writing of the front-end side, creating a better-performing application and a cleaner and maintainable code.
* All main Javascript functionalities are written using tests.
* Tutoring of an intern and senior coach to less experienced colleagues.
